summary: SummaryThe MAC Studio Radiance Moisturizing + Illuminating Primer provides immediate and lasting radiance, and all-day soothing hydration. Preps skin for smooth makeup application.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides immediate and long-term moisture, 8 hoursProvides immediate and long-term radiance, 8 hoursPreps skin for smooth makeup applicationImmediately soothes skin through hydrationFor all skin typesDoes not cause acneItem 2593996How To UseSmooth evenly onto cleansed face after moisturizer (and before foundation) using fingertips, sponge or the 170S Brush.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butylene Glycol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Isononyl Isononanoate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Niacinamide, Sorbitol, Trehalose, Fragrance (Parfum), Dimethicone, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Sodium Polyaspartate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Hdi/Ppg/Polycaprolactone Crosspolymer, Octyldodecyl Xyloside, Quaternium-90 Bentonite, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Chloride, Silica, Propylene Carbonate, Isopropyl Isostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Smooth evenly onto cleansed face after moisturizer (and before foundation) using fingertips, sponge or the 170S Brush.

reviews.headline: Mac primer the best!
reviews.comments: I love this Mac primer, it feels so soft on my skin, it smooths the fine lines around my lips before using makeup, I have used it for about 6 months and I am so happy with it

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: It's ok. It's moisturizing and glowy. It does nothing to extend the wear of makeup. I also noticed that my concealer pilled terribly on top of this primer. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Great primer for dry skin.
reviews.comments: Great product!

reviews.headline: Not for oily skin
reviews.comments: I do love the hydrating properties of this primer but i have incredibly oily skin and unfortunately this reads greasy on my skin. I do still use this because of the cost but once its out i will try a different primer. It has a light scent also so if you are not into scented products this may not be for you.

reviews.headline: I love this primer!
reviews.comments: I'm a Pro MUA and I keep this primer in my kit at all times! It feels like skincare and gives the skin a beautiful radiance to it. Love love love!

reviews.headline: I would purchase product again
reviews.comments: Love the Mac primer. My makeup looks much better

reviews.headline: NOT Gluten Free !! And has "fragrance" in it.
reviews.comments: Just a note to those who are gluten sensitive, this contains barley and wheat products, which made my skin tingly.  But especially annoying was the smell. I wish companies would quit putting perfume or fragrance in their skin care products. Mac, I love your other products, so do better on this one.

reviews.headline: The best primer I have ever used!
reviews.comments: This primer keeps my foundation looking fresh all day long. I run and it even holds up through the sweat and humidity!! I will never use anything else!

reviews.headline: Game changer for people with dry patches!
reviews.comments:
Definitely for the dry skinned folks. Super glowy when you first apply (not the shimmery kind like strobe cream) this just gives a hydrated and dewy look. Feels like you applied the most amazing moisturizer and melts into the skin. Once you use powder over its not very glowy but it keeps dry skin hydrated throughout the day so you don't get those dreadful flaky patches! Love this primer under the studio fix powder and topped with Fix+ setting spray! 
I do wish it came in a bigger bottle because I feel like it takes a few pumps per use so I know i'm gonna fly trough it.

reviews.headline: NO MORE DRY SPOTS!
reviews.comments: GREAT PRODUCT! Not only does it moisturize but it feels non greasy and last all day.

reviews.headline: I will definitely buy again
reviews.comments: I love love this product! Made my face look hydrated and make up go on smooth

reviews.headline: Love it!!!
reviews.comments: It Works amazing on my skin. I actually have super dry sensitive skin and haven't had any problems using it. I would use it either with my Mac foundation or with out it. This primer helps my skin have this  illusion of glowing which i enjoy it.

reviews.headline: Something new I tried and love it!
reviews.comments: Back to liquid foundation after so many years. Love this product

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comments: I love this foundation. I sometimes forget to put setting spray and my makeup stays on. I am a bit on the oily side, but I just love how I can work with my cream products.

reviews.headline: Just get it.
reviews.comments: Love this. Light, moisturizing and keeps my make up in place.

reviews.headline: i would purchase again
reviews.comments: love it

reviews.headline: A Must Have
reviews.comments: My makeup and face looks so much better

reviews.headline: Great product....
reviews.comments: Love it!.....

reviews.headline: Great primer
reviews.comments: This is a great primer. Before my nose makeup would smear but now it does not. My makeup lasts all day.

reviews.headline: Yes yes yes
reviews.comments: I love how moisturizing it is makes my makeup blend like butter and it stays on all day. Buying again.

media.headline: Best complete moisturizer/primer I've ever used. Yes I would
media.caption: The best moisturizer primer I've ever used, gives the moisture, the radiance and the primer that's needed to wear foundation or not, and have that same glow and smoothness

faceoff_positive.comments:
Definitely for the dry skinned folks. Super glowy when you first apply (not the shimmery kind like strobe cream) this just gives a hydrated and dewy look. Feels like you applied the most amazing moisturizer and melts into the skin. Once you use powder over its not very glowy but it keeps dry skin hydrated throughout the day so you don't get those dreadful flaky patches! Love this primer under the studio fix powder and topped with Fix+ setting spray! 
I do wish it came in a bigger bottle because I feel like it takes a few pumps per use so I know i'm gonna fly trough it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Game changer for people with dry patches!

faceoff_negative.comments: I would like to love this MAC primer.  I was sold in store when sampled on my hand. Supper hydrated and soft. I love it alone as an extra moisturizer.  However on my maturing skin in my mid 40's it doesn't look great. Settles in my fine lines and all my pores. :( I've spent the last week applying my makeup with different methods, fingers which I know is taboo, brush, and sponge. Every single time same results. After cleaning face and applying moisturizer as instructed as well. I'm so bummed out. I'll be returning this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Would like to love it
